g.text: A Pure-Rust PostGIS-Compatible Spatial Extension for SQLite

div.style: font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; color: #2D3436; line-height: 1.7;
div.p: GeoLite is a pure-Rust spatial extension for SQLite that brings PostGIS-compatible geospatial capabilities to embedded databases. Built with zero C dependencies and full WebAssembly support, it enables spatial queries in environments ranging from edge devices to web browsers.

The library implements a comprehensive set of spatial SQL functions,including geometry I/O, constructors, spatial predicates, measurements, and accessor operations,all following PostGIS naming conventions and semantics. A full Diesel ORM integration provides compile-time checked spatial queries for Rust applications.

Organized as a Rust workspace with three focused crates, GeoLite targets developers building location-aware applications, GIS tooling, or spatial data pipelines who need a lightweight, embeddable alternative to PostGIS.

g.text: The incumbent spatial extension for SQLite

div.style: font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #636E72; line-height: 1.6;

foreignObject.div: Wraps GEOS, PROJ, and liblwgeom,a heavy C/C++ dependency chain that prevents WebAssembly compilation and makes cross-compilation difficult.

div.style: font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #636E72; line-height: 1.6;

foreignObject.div: Zero C dependencies, compiles to both native and WebAssembly targets. Same spatial SQL capabilities as SpatiaLite without the build complexity.

div.style: font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #636E72; line-height: 1.6;

foreignObject.div: Uses PostGIS function names and semantics. Spatial queries are portable between SQLite (via GeoLite) and PostgreSQL (via PostGIS) with no changes needed.

g.text: Pure Rust geometry library,zero C dependencies, no FFI
SQLite loadable extension via C FFI
triggers on the underlying R-tree table.

div.style: font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #636E72; text-align: center; line-height: 1.6;

foreignObject.div: Zero C dependencies. Memory-safe by design. No unsafe FFI in the core library. Built on the geo and geozero ecosystem.

div.style: font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #636E72; text-align: center; line-height: 1.6;

foreignObject.div: Compiles to wasm32 target. Runs spatial queries directly in web browsers via sqlite-wasm-rs.

div.style: font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #636E72; text-align: center; line-height: 1.6;

foreignObject.div: Same function names, same semantics. Drop-in replacement for PostGIS spatial queries on SQLite databases. OGC SF compliant.

div.style: font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', system-ui, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: #636E72; text-align: center; line-height: 1.6;

foreignObject.div: Full Diesel integration with Geometry and Geography SQL types. Compile-time checked queries.

g.text: Extended Well-Known Binary,PostGIS storage format with SRID

div.style: font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'SF Mono', 'Consolas', monospace; font-size: 12px; color: #E8E8E8; line-height: 1.65; white-space: pre; overflow: hidden;

foreignObject.div:
.load geolite_sqlite
SELECT name, ST_Distance( location, ST_Point(-73.9857, 40.7484) ) AS dist FROM places WHERE ST_DWithin(location, ST_Point(-73.9857, 40.7484), 1000);

div.style: font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'SF Mono', 'Consolas', monospace; font-size: 12px; color: #E8E8E8; line-height: 1.65; white-space: pre; overflow: hidden;

g.text: A Pure-Rust PostGIS-Compatible Spatial Extension for SQLite
